GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
irqchip/apple-aic: Fix refcount leak in build_fiq_affinity

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit 2dc14cebe5dc053434b507bb24e6821cb795050f, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit a5e8801202b318622ea526aa5625e5f7eceb4d26. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: irqchip/apple-aic: Fix refcount leak in build_fiq_affinity
